title: cypher plan validate
description: validate file used to check cypher plan opt

vid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node By Id Seek[10,]

vid.query: MATCH (n) WHERE id(n) IN [1,2,4] RETURN n
vid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node By Id Seek[1,2,4,]

vid.query: MATCH (n) WHERE id(n)=1 OR id(n)=3 OR id(n)=4 OR id(n)=18 OR id(n)=1111 RETURN n
vid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node By Id Seek[1,3,4,18,1111,]

vid.query: MATCH (n) WHERE id(n)=1 OR id(n)=3 AND id(n)=4 OR id(n)=18 OR id(n)=1111 RETURN n
vid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Filter [((({id(false,n) = 1}||({id(false,n) = 3}&&{id(false,n) = 4}))||{id(false,n) = 18})||{id(false,n) = 1111})]
            All Node Scan [n]

uid.query: MATCH (n) where n.name="Rachel Kempson" RETURN n
uid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node Index Seek [n] name IN [Rachel Kempson,]

uid.query: MATCH (n) where n.name in ["Rachel Kempson","Dennis Quaid","none"] RETURN n
uid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node Index Seek [n] name IN [Rachel Kempson,Dennis Quaid,none,]

uid.query: MATCH (n) where n.name ="Rachel Kempson" or n.name= "Dennis Quaid" or n.name="none" RETURN n
uid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node Index Seek [n] name IN [Rachel Kempson,Dennis Quaid,none,]

uid.query: MATCH (n) where n.name = "Rachel Kempson" and n.name = "Dennis Quaid" or n.name = "Vanessa Redgrave" RETURN n
uid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Filter [(({n.name = Rachel Kempson}&&{n.name = Dennis Quaid})||{n.name = Vanessa Redgrave})]
            All Node Scan [n]

uid.query: MATCH (n) where n.name = "Rachel Kempson" or n.name = "Dennis Quaid" or n.name = "Vanessa Redgrave" RETURN n
uid.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [n]
        Node Index Seek [n] name IN [Rachel Kempson,Dennis Quaid,Vanessa Redgrave,]

list.plan:
Execution Plan:
Produce Results
    Project [id(n),label(n),properties(n)]
        All Node Scan [n]

parallel_traversal.query: MATCH (n:Person) where n.birthyear > 1900 and n.birthyear < 2000 return count(n)
